<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<hosts>
	<host>
		<personality>controller</personality>
		<mgmt_mac>08:00:27:d0:e0:2b</mgmt_mac>
		<mgmt_ip>192.168.204.3</mgmt_ip>
		<!--Uncomment the statement below to power on the host automatically through board management.-->
		<!--<power_on />-->
		<bm_type/>
		<bm_username/>
		<bm_password/>
		<boot_device>sda</boot_device>
		<rootfs_device>sda</rootfs_device>
		<install_output>text</install_output>
		<console>ttyS0,115200</console>
	</host>
	<host>
		<personality>compute</personality>
		<mgmt_mac>08:00:27:bf:29:39</mgmt_mac>
		<mgmt_ip>192.168.204.20</mgmt_ip>
		<location/>
		<!--Uncomment the statement below to power on the host automatically through board management.-->
		<!--<power_on />-->
		<bm_type/>
		<bm_username/>
		<bm_password/>
		<boot_device>sda</boot_device>
		<rootfs_device>sda</rootfs_device>
		<install_output>text</install_output>
		<console>ttyS0,115200</console>
	</host>
</hosts>
